3.0.2.title: Duopoly
3.0.2.desc: Most of the commands are transformed to both text based (old) and application commands(slash)

fields.control: You can control which systems will be enabled for the server and can disable as per liking
fields.on/off: Welcome and Emoji Systems can be toggled on and off by admins

3.0.1.title: Remaking the Bot
3.0.1.desc: Bot is going under various revisions, and will be recoded several times.

3.0.0.title: Big News!(CyberFire)
3.0.0.desc:
Finally Cyber has Slash commands 
Kick and Reinvite Cyber with the new invite link

fields.nostalgic: You can you both slash commands and the normal ones
fields.archived: Old Code for Cyber is archived,and will not be maintained
fields.lit!: Icon Changed to match the CyberFire Theme for version 3

2.8.1d.title: Hyperlinks Ignored
2.8.1d.desc: Now the emoticon system ignores http(s) links and doesn't provide any emoji based on it

2.8.1c.title: Emoticons
2.8.1c.desc: just try doing XD or => now!

fields.=>: Now all (most of) the emojies will be read by cyber and provide a (mostly) relevent gif

2.8.1b.title: Gif
2.8.1b.desc: u are used to gifs right, :troll: if a server has the emoji, discord will handle it, if not let cyber to handle it

fields.format: should start with ':' and then the name/text.
fields.tenor: credits are required ig, all the gifs are from tenor!

2.8.1.title: Added Plans!
2.8.1.desc: Now all the plans for the bot will be logged,

2.8.0.title: Added Changelogs!
2.8.0.desc: Now all the changes will be logged here, Other changes are,

fields.creators: Creators will be credited in the footer of help command
fields.leaderboard: Only top 50 active Users will be displayed over the website
fields.status: Bot changes its activity status every 30 seconds
